nodes.text: Creed was a bounty hunter. At some point, he ended up on the planet Kathol where he began learning Ta-Ree spells from a Yapi shaman. Creed learned spells including block pain and boost attribute. Creed was also hired by Themog, a criminal on the planet Chrona, to kill newly deputized Protectors.
Creed was an example character used in Endgame to teach players how the learning of Ta-Ree spells worked.
